Text: These books are in "Microsoft Reader" format. You need to download the freeware from them to read the books.
my friend says thanks in Great Britain we can't get westerns in audio books for the blind at the libraries
though these were audio books but they are written book for Microsoft reader

You can download converter from here

http://www.processtext.com/abclit.html
Some of the books, such as How the West Was Won, The Daybreakers, and Sitka are incomplete. I about threw my computer through the wall when I realized I had read 400 pgs for nothing.
